resources.string: All income received as salary under employer-employee relationship .This included all the components like HRA, LTA, Conveyance, Medical Allowance, PF and special allowance
Basic Salary which is the direct remuneration component in a compensation package on which other benefits like Provident Fund, Gratuity etc.
Salary component for House and rent
Salary component for Leave and travel

Other Income includes income from 
1.House property 
2.Capital Gain 
3.Commission 
4.Business 
5.Winnings from lottery, Crozzword puzzle etc
